title: Codona (Collin Walcott, Don Cherry, Nana Vasconcelos) Discograph
description:
Artist Biography:
Name derived from the letters of the name of Collin Walcott (tabla, sitar), Don Cherry (tpt, p, hunter&#039;s guitar), and Nana Vasconcelos (per). Multi-ethnic improvisational music, mostly stemming from Walcott&#039;s interest in Eastern Indian rhythms and Vasconcelos&#039;s Brazilian heritage. Cherry&#039;s experience with folk music of Scandinavia, Morocco, and Africa makes for a unique, major-league fusion.

***
